product_name: The North Face Brand-On Flat Brim Hat
long_description: Low-profile style and subtle details make the Brand-On Flat Brim Hat from The North Face a street-smart fashion statement. A pop of color under the brim adds a little something extra to seal the deal.
short_description: Low-profile style and subtle details make the Brand-On Flat Brim Hat from The North Face a street-smart fashion statement. A pop of color under the brim adds a little something extra to seal the deal.
